manifest.name: Custom File Explorer sorting
manifest.description: Allows for manual and automatic, config-driven reordering and sorting of files and folders in File Explorer
manifest.author: SebastianMC

data.manifestValue: Allows for manual and automatic, config-driven reordering and sorting of files and folders in File Explorer
